sentences.sContent: Lohmann speculates that hatchling turtles may imprint on the magnetic field of their home beach and, if so, such a phenomenon could be the basis of strategies for species preservation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Lohmann speculates that hatchling turtles may imprint on the magnetic field of their home beach and, if so, such a phenomenon could be the basis of strategies for species preservation.
sentences.sCn: 罗曼推测，人工孵化的海龟也许会留下它们家乡海滩磁场的烙印，如果是这样，这种现象可能会成为物种保护的策略基础。

words.tran: 孵化；策划（hatch的过去分词形式）
[禽] 孵化；给…加影线；策划（hatch的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 人工孵化的鱼苗或小鸟
trans.tranOther: a young animal that has newly emerged from an egg
